John 3:16.text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

Psalm 23:1.text: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.

Romans 8:28.text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.

Philippians 4:13.text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.

Jeremiah 29:11.text: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.

Proverbs 3:5.text: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.

Isaiah 40:31.text: But they that wait upon the LORD shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles; they shall run, and not be weary; and they shall walk, and not faint.

Matthew 28:20.text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.

1 Corinthians 13:4.text: Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up,

Genesis 1:1.text: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
